nodes.bodyText: It is not necessary, I wanted to create new KeyOptions based on their input values and therefor I created two implementations, 1. KeyManagerOptions and 2. KeyManagerFactoryOptions as one can be build from the keymanagerfactory and the other one from just only a keymanager. But if you prefer to have a single implementation I can move the constructor to KeyManagerFactoryOptions
